item.description:
Lets celebrate the (almost) end of another week by eating delicious indian food. I like this place (and I am a vegetarian!).. have been there 2-3 times already.

The positives:
+ good food
+ in cambridge (officially in somerville, but its pretty close to harvard/inman square)
+ red line T-accessible (somebody will have to pick you up from harvard sq, but that's no big deal)

Negatives:
- its a small place, so I'll keep the event small

Let us know if you need a ride from any red line T station in your RSVP. I'll plan accordingly. Hope to meet some new faces and some old ones again.
item.name: Last minute meetup - Dinner at Kebab Factory
